title: What were the remarkable experiments of M. Donato, and how did they raise questions about the powers and limitations of hypnotism?
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the author discusses the incredible experiments conducted by M. Donato in which he hypnotizes young men with the power of his gaze. The author discusses the skepticism surrounding hypnotism and warns against charlatanism but also emphasizes the need for open-mindedness and careful observation when it comes to such phenomena. The author also touches upon the influence of the mind on the body and the importance of avoiding mercantilism and self-interest when conducting research. Overall, the author calls for a scientific exploration of the mysteries of the mind and its influence on the body.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the study of mesmerism and its effects on the human body has been subject to much speculation and debate over the years. While some may doubt its authenticity, the multitude of experiments and testimonials from reputable sources suggest otherwise. It is important to continue exploring this field of study for the betterment of humanity. We must approach it with caution and not succumb to exaggeration or sensationalism. Nonetheless, the existence of individuals with such mysterious abilities cannot be ignored, and it is necessary to consider the potential impacts on society.
